Key Match Events: Angel Di Maria scored the only goal of the match in the 40th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Lionel Messi was sidelined for the first half due to a right hamstring injury
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni praised his team's performance and competition level
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina hasn't lost to Ecuador in their last seven meetings, a streak dating back to 2019
Others: The match was a Copa America warmup for Argentina
